XTAL_32K.description: The crystal with capacitors are already on the board, next to the pins '32' and '33'.

SDIO1.description: Not routed out, the pins are used for onboard QSPI flash chip.

HS1.description: Not routed out, the pins are used for onboard QSPI flash chip.

SPI.description: Onboard QSPI flash chip is connected to it. Primary pins are not routed out.

UART0.description: Primary TX and RX pins are connected to the onboard FTDI chip for USB serial functionality.

UART2.description: Primary CTS/RTS pins are not routed out, they are used by the onboard QSPI flash.

pins.description: Connected to pin '37' (SENSOR_CAPP) through a 270pF capacitor.
Connected to pin '36' (SENSOR_VP) through a 270pF capacitor.
Connected to pin '39' (SENSOR_VN) through a 270pF capacitor.
Connected to pin '38' (SENSOR_CAPN) through a 270pF capacitor.
Connected to pin '33' through a 32.768kHz crystal.
Connected to pin '32' through a 32.768kHz crystal.

pins.name: /RST
pins.description: Connected to the CHIP_PU pin on the MCU. Pulled up with an onboard 10k resistor. Connect to GND to reset the CPU. Onboard 'RST' button connects it to GND. The auto-reset mechanism also controls it for flash programming.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.description: 3V3 output from the onboard regulator. Connects to different power inputs of the MCU with multiple decoupling capacitors.

pins.name: VBAT
pins.description: Battery power. Connected directly to the LiPo battery and the charger.

pins.name: VUSB
pins.description: Connected to the USB power input. Can be used to directly power the board instead of the USB, or if the board is powered by USB this pin provides 5V.

pins.name: VUSB
pins.description: Connected to the USB power input. Can be used to directly power the board instead of the USB, or if the board is powered by USB this pin provides 5V.

pins.name: VBAT
pins.description: Battery power. Connected directly to the LiPo battery and the charger.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.description: 3V3 output from the onboard regulator. Connects to different power inputs of the MCU with multiple decoupling capacitors.
Pulled up with a 10k resistor. Connect to GND at startup to enter flash programming mode. Onboard '0' button connects it to GND. The auto-reset mechanism also controls it for flash programming.
Connected to the LED next to the pin.

pins.name: RX
pins.description: Connected to the onboard FTDI chip's 'TX' pin.

pins.name: TX
pins.description: Connected to the onboard FTDI chip's 'RX' pin.
